name: Short Text Classifier Train Processor
description: Trains a short text classification model.

parameters.name: model_name
parameters.description: Name of the model to be trained. If a model with that name is already available, that model will be used for additional training. Otherwise a new model with this name will be instantiated.

parameters.name: destroy_on_eof
parameters.description: Will this model be cleaned up once EOF is reached.

parameters.name: wait_for_store
parameters.description: Whether to wait for the model to be stored in the model repository. Setting this to true will ensure the model exists when proceeding to the next processor.

parameters.name: data_field
parameters.description: The field the data resides in. Data must be a string of words.

parameters.name: label_field
parameters.description: The field the label is in. Value must be a double.

parameters.name: min_count
parameters.description: The minimum times a feature should be present.

parameters.name: C
parameters.description: The cost of exceeding the penalty (1 - 100).

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of all the data inside the DP. Used for finding sentence boundaries.

parameters.name: seed_word_file
parameters.description: The file that contains the seed words for this language. Can be computed via PMI for a specific label in a dataset.

parameters.name: right_flip_file
parameters.description: The file that contains the right flips for this language.

parameters.name: left_flip_file
parameters.description: The file that contains the left flips for this language.

parameters.name: vector_file
parameters.description: The file that contains the FastText word vectors.

parameters.name: similarity_threshold
parameters.description: The threshold determining when a seed words is similar enough to a non-seed word using Cosine Similarity.
